model_repr:
NASCNN15(
  (conv1): Conv2d(3, 36, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (bn1): BatchNorm2d(36, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv2): Conv2d(36, 48, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (bn2): BatchNorm2d(48, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv3): Conv2d(84, 36, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1))
  (bn3): BatchNorm2d(36, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv4): Conv2d(84, 36, kernel_size=(3, 5), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 2))
  (bn4): BatchNorm2d(36, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv5): Conv2d(72, 48, kernel_size=(5, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(2, 1))
  (bn5): BatchNorm2d(48, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv6): Conv2d(84, 36, kernel_size=(1, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(0, 3))
  (bn6): BatchNorm2d(36, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv7): Conv2d(84, 48, kernel_size=(7, 1), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 0))
  (bn7): BatchNorm2d(48, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv8): Conv2d(84, 48, kernel_size=(3, 5), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 2))
  (bn8): BatchNorm2d(48, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv9): Conv2d(96, 64, kernel_size=(5, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(2, 1))
  (bn9): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv10): Conv2d(112, 64, kernel_size=(5, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(2, 3))
  (bn10): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv11): Conv2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(7, 5), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 2))
  (bn11): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv12): Conv2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(3, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 3))
  (bn12): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv13): Conv2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(7, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 1))
  (bn13): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv14): Conv2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(5, 7), stride=(1, 1), padding=(2, 3))
  (bn14): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (conv15): Conv2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(7, 1), stride=(1, 1), padding=(3, 0))
  (bn15): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (fc): Linear(in_features=64, out_features=10, bias=True)
  (final_activation): Softmax(dim=1)
)
train_transforms:
Train transforms:
Compose(
      Resize(size=[40, 40], interpolation=InterpolationMode.BILINEAR, antialias=True)
      RandomCrop(size=(32, 32), padding=[4, 4, 4, 4], pad_if_needed=False, fill=0, padding_mode=constant)
      RandomHorizontalFlip(p=0.5)
      ToImage()
      ToDtype(scale=True)
      ZCAWhitening()
)
val_transforms:
Validation transforms:
Compose(
      Resize(size=[40, 40], interpolation=InterpolationMode.BILINEAR, antialias=True)
      CenterCrop(size=(32, 32))
      ToImage()
      ToDtype(scale=True)
      ZCAWhitening()
      Identity()
)
